Texts.Chs: 记录了各种精彩的缝纫和装饰工艺指导的多彩杂志。每一件物品都是由其他种族的人肉制成的，如果你不是叶族人，这可能会让你很沮丧。值得注意的是，三篇单独的文章详细描述了从一个仍然活着的“捐赠者”身上移除肌肉的过程。
Texts.Eng: A colorful magazine loaded with all sorts of wonderful sewing and decorative craft instruction. Every single object is crafted in flesh from other races, which is likely quite upsetting if you are not a Floran. Of note, three separate articles detail removing flesh from a still-living 'donor'.
